website_summaries.verdict: Fashion-forward design that adopts classic adidas slide details and marries them with a statement-making ankle strap.
pros: Bold logo across the main strap
It’s easy to find a comfortable fit with the Velcro ankle straps
While the outsole is on the flatter side, it’s fully textured and grooved to provide decent grip to the ground
cons: Even if you are wearing the correct size, the toe box and lateral sides may appear a bit too wide for your feet

customer_reviews.title: Get them!!😍
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wearing them for about a week, and I love them! Super comfortable. I wasn’t sure if I would be in love with the style and look of them, but I was pleasantly surprised. I wear an 8.5 and went with a 9. They fit fine, but wish I’d have gotten the 8.
customer_reviews.author: Arabella

customer_reviews.title: Better than the Nike tanjun sandles
customer_reviews.text: Best choice I've made all month. Extremely comfortable, I have planter fasciitis and I can wear these all day. Not to mention how fashionable and cute. Buy'em girl!!
customer_reviews.author: Sade Crews

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: My wife loved it she said that they super comfortable she went to work with them on. Im planning on buying the green ones as well but idk why the price goes up and down on them.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear size 6.5. Unfortunately, they did not have my size. Usually, Addidas run a little longer, so I downsized and I got size 6. My toes reach the edge of the sandals (with a few millimeters to spare). I'm glad I did not go for a size 7 because I have a feeling that it would have been too long. I think one of its best qualities is that the back strap is adjustable; this allows people with different ankle sizes to securely and comfortably wear the sandal. I took off one star because the footbed/soles are harder and not as comfortable as other Addidas shoes (e.g., Adilette Comfort Slides). However, overall, I am satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: AvidReader

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute, and Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews I initially went down in size ordering a size seven. I then exchanged and got my normal show size (8) and they fit perfectly! I have what I would call a average width of foot. It’s not too narrow, but also not considered wide. If you have a narrower for going down in size may work for you. And of course if it’s wider perhaps go up. Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: Alisha K.

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy, perfect summer sandal
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy and cute. The ridge that falls between your toes and the ball of your foot on the right shoe doesn’t quite hit in the perfect spot but I think that is more my foot than the shoe. I bought my normal size of a 9 and it fits fine otherwise. The material of the sole is similar to crocks but doesn’t seem to get slippery when you get sweaty or wet like crocks. There is a little bit of rubbing on the right shoe also. On the inside under my ankle. The edge of the strap where the stitching is rubs a bit rough but I’m hoping it will fade as they get broken in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be careful if you have wider feet
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a size 8 when I typically wear an 8.5. Length wise they fit perfect but the strap across the toe box is not wide enough for these to be comfortable for me. They do seem to be a wider width when looking at the foot bed but the strap keeps them from being able to be worn
customer_reviews.author: kendra

customer_reviews.title: Run big but cute and stylish
customer_reviews.text: OKAY GUYSS I was so excited about these sandals bc summer is approaching and they met my expectations. They’re really cute!! My boyfriend was complimenting me all day on them. They’re light weight but feel secure. They are a little big bc I usually wear a size W 9 but I know Adidas run big so I went a size down and I’m glad, they just fit. Not too big not too small. A size 8 worked for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kennedydiane

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, cute, very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are actually my fav pair of shoes (and I have a lot of shoes). I actually bought them for camping because I needed some shoes to wear in the water where there’s a lot of rocks, but I wear them all the time now. They are super lightweight, easy to clean, and really cute! Not to mention they’re very comfortable. I feel like they are really good quality for the price! I definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: So Cute
customer_reviews.text: I loved the shoes. I’m a size 8 and their a perfect fit. they are a little wide for me, but my feet are very narrow and skinny. I love them and can’t wait to wear them! Wish they had them in more colors. Great product. Very sturdy and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, stylish but wide
customer_reviews.text: These are nice and comfy. They are cheaper than the Nike tanjun sandals but don’t fit as snug. I have a narrow foot so they are a bit wide on me compared to most sandals. I like the look of them. I also enjoy that they make my feet look shorter than they really are. I don’t feel like I can job in them, or do other sporty type activities in these due to their width and looseness like I can with my nikes , but I do still like their style and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Fontaine

customer_reviews.title: Size down, walk on a cloud!
customer_reviews.text: These feel like walking on clouds. Super light weight but comfortable and supportive. I wear a true size 8 and I ordered a 7 after reading reviews about sizing down, and they are a perfect fit. Roomy, supportive and stylish. I have been wearing these with shorts and jeans both, they’re really versatile! I might order another pair just because I love them that much. These would be perfect for wearing if you were doing a lot of waking!
customer_reviews.author: KN615

customer_reviews.title: These ADIDAS SANDALS are outstanding!
customer_reviews.text: I love.....everything about this ADIDAS sandal.The ADIDAS sandals are Cute,Comfortable,stylish and theres nothing big about this shoe.I wear a size 81/2 shoe all...day everyday.The ADIDAS sandal fit true to size..I would suggest you buy a YOUR SIZE! IF YOU WEAR A 8 PURCHASE AND 8 if youre in half sizes GO UP A SIZE BIGGER BECAUSE SANDAL IS ON POINT WITH THE SIZE.I PURCHASE A 9 AND I DONT HAVE WIDE FEET AT ALL!IT WASNT NO EXTRA SPACE .IM TELLING YOU IF I WAS TO HAVE GOTTEN AN 8 IT WOULDVE BEEN TOO SMALL SO LADIES IF YOURE IN HALF SIZES GO UP TO THE NEXT SIZE PLEASE..........MY SHOES FIT PERFECT!
customer_reviews.author: janrace newkirk

customer_reviews.title: Cute, perfect for summer/casual outfits
customer_reviews.text: I was sold on these when I saw all the beautiful pics everyone posted. For size reference, I wear a 5.5y, 7 in women(Sneakers) and sometimes even 7.5 or 8 in sandals depending on style. I went with my gut and ordered a 7 in these and they fit perfect. They’re very comfortable and the the material with the logo is soft so it does not rub against the skin. Great purchase they look so cute on, love the contrast with the white and black. For half size I’d say order down.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy, super cute. My aunt has limited mobility in her dominant arm due to a stroke. I bought her a pair as well (this purchase / review), and she can get them on and off on her own. She said it was the first time she was able to feel cute in a long time. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but not comfy
customer_reviews.text: Very stylish and perfect on the go sandal if you’re not doing a lot of walking or standing! The downside is they offer no support and are not good for walking long distances. I expected them to be more cushion like my adidas slides but they are hard and very flat. I wore these all day while very busy and moving around a lot and my legs and feet were sore for days! The Velcro strap on one of the shoes is also peeling off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: These shoe are so cute and comfortable! The really look good with sporty adidas clothing or non-label sport wear. Great for travel also!
customer_reviews.author: Cinnamon Girl

customer_reviews.title: BUY THEM NOW!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these suckers!! I wear a 9.5 in womens and a size 9 fits spot on. With Adidas you always order a half size down when compared to Nike. They are perfect for travel as well.
customer_reviews.author: yllwkid

customer_reviews.title: I loooove these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I loooooove these shoes!!! They are prefect for vacation. I got a size 7
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Picky Teen
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my very hard to please teenage daughter. She FINALLY has found a pair of Sandler’s that fit good, look nice, and she says they are “way comfy “. So far they have held up great and she wears them everyday. I am probably going to but her another pair since it is the inky shoe she will wear right now!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: The're a little long for the size, and the front band is overly roomy even for my Wide foot. I wish the foot bed could be softer, like my pair of Adidas slides from a few years ago. But I like this brand because of the metatarsal bump, which makes them comfortable even without my orthotics.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Def made for wider feet
customer_reviews.text: Loved them! Super authentic & I went with my normal size in women’s 7. People in the reviews were saying to go down a size of you have narrow feet well I do believe that’s true. The sandal is def made for ppl with wider feet but it didn’t make a difference in the sizing for me it still fit well & my toes were t hanging out in the front & neither was the back so I had no problem. My net purchase will be a 6 just to see if it makes a slight difference. I don’t think it matters tho
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Terrible.
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are terribly designed. The arch is in the totally wrong place that causes a “farting” sound whenever you take a step, which is super embarrassing. They also are not for wide feet AT ALL. I even bought the next size up and the width was still too skinny and the length was too long.
customer_reviews.author: Lalanie22

customer_reviews.title: Love these Sandals
customer_reviews.text: I love these sandals. I wear a size 9 with width feet, these fit perfectly. They are soft and comfortable. Great wear!
customer_reviews.author: Rae

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful.. no regrets
customer_reviews.text: I was scared to get a size 9 (my regular size) bcuz of the reviews. I kept seeing people say they wide. So I took a chance and ordered a size 8, and they fit my thin feet self perfectly lol. So if your feet not wide, I say go a size down. I love them..
customer_reviews.author: Lovable

customer_reviews.title: Cute beach sandal
customer_reviews.text: True to size. Cute sandal. Perfect for the beach and for travel because they are so light, easy to pack and u can get them wet I like these better than wearing slides. I feel they are more practical. I wish adidas made these with a black footbed and sole for a monochromatic look
customer_reviews.author: GB

customer_reviews.title: Run a bit small
customer_reviews.text: Usually I'm a size 8 but I think these shoes run a little small, should of got atleast a 8.5 but they fit fine just a little snug. Love the shoes & nice quality
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Love these sandals
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shoe because I hate the slides. For reason I just can't get with it. This sandal is perfect for those who need wide width. They are very lightweight and comfortable for all day wear. I always get compliments on such a simple sandal.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffi

customer_reviews.title: No half sizing
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are super cute and comfortable. I unfortunately Had to return them. I am a true 9.5 women’s shoe. A 9 would be too small so I ordered the 10. There is a tool break and it did not sit well with my feet as the were too large. The sole was very soft and the straps were squishy. If they came in half sizes I would have kept them. Cute trend sandal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Oh my stars 🤩🤩🤩 I love these sandals😍😍😍they are comfortable they run a little big I wear a Womens 9 I could have got the 8.5 but they still fit good! Only thing I didn’t like is that the box was beat up they came in but the shoes were fine.
customer_reviews.author: Covered girl

customer_reviews.title: Very cute! Order a size down!
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews & everyone was saying to order a size down & they were right! 🙌🏼 I normally wear an 8. Size 7 fits perfect. However, if your feet are wider or bigger around, I would order your actual size. They’re soo comfy & super cute!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Yow

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs Up
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It’s the real deal these aren’t fake. They aren’t soft and cushiony but you can walk in them and use them for style. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee Abernathy

customer_reviews.title: Ok fit for wide feet too! So comfy! 👌👌👌
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable so cute!!!! I get a lot of compliments! I have wide feet and they fit nicely still!
customer_reviews.author: Sara DeClercque

customer_reviews.title: 10 for comfort
customer_reviews.text: Let my start off by saying that they are very comfortable. They do look a little cheap for what the cost is. Super easy to clean. Dry quickly. I would buy your regular size, unless you’re a half size. Ex. If you are 7.5, 7 would be a good fit. I’m an 8 and decided to get a 7. They fit perfect with NO room. I would rather some wiggle room. It’s about preference I guess. Overall, comfortable shoe and go with your size.
customer_reviews.author: Mag Mac

customer_reviews.title: If your a half size go up a whole number
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are extremely comfy and great for people who need foot support or if you typically wear foot inserts in your shoes (these have the same feeling). I’m a 8.5 and got a size 9 I would say if your a half size go up since there aren’t half sizes available.
customer_reviews.author: richard rios

customer_reviews.title: Best Slide Sandal !!!
customer_reviews.text: I am a true size 11 women’s and 9.5 in men’s. These fit so comfortably! I cannot believe it. I love slides so this was a very comfortable way to wear for distance walking. So many compliments. I would buy every color if they had it!
customer_reviews.author: Mil

customer_reviews.title: Good vacation shoe
customer_reviews.text: I wore these sandals for our family vacation. I did a lot of walking the day I wore them and didn’t have any problems. I broke my ankle a few years ago and most sandals are unbearable to wear for long periods of time. These adidas sandals were very comfortable and had enough cushion to where my feet didn’t end up hurting.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Muckleroy

customer_reviews.title: Great Sandal! Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love these sandals. I’m going to order another pair in a different color. Very lightweight; I forget they’re on my feet at times. Even sturdy enough to jog in lol, don’t try that too much They fit perfectly and the strap allows you to adjust to skinny and wide feet
customer_reviews.author: Sarah F.

customer_reviews.title: Buy them now, don't second guest
customer_reviews.text: I love how comfortable they are! I have them on all day and nothing aches! Its light, soft and cute! Feels like I'm walking clouds. I even walked a whole 5 mile trail with them and my feet felt great by the end of the night!
customer_reviews.author: Orange

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love these sandals. They fit true to size for me. However, I am nine months pregnant and my feet are fatter than normal. The Sandals provide the exact amount of comfort I need in these last days of pregnancy.
customer_reviews.author: Khadijah

customer_reviews.title: They are not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I don’t care for the fact the sole doesn’t extend under the toes. My feel are not balanced.
customer_reviews.author: Nora

customer_reviews.title: So good product
customer_reviews.text: Just buy with your size. It look so cute on feet. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: DAJEONG L.

customer_reviews.title: I love them.
customer_reviews.text: I have the Nike ones and I have to say that these are my favorite. I have a wide foot, and these are roomy and just absolutely perfect.
customer_reviews.author: memz

customer_reviews.title: Good support, cute
customer_reviews.text: Got them for work as the floors are hard and hurt my back after awhile. These provide plenty of support and are easy to slip on. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: elly

customer_reviews.title: If you're a 7.5, don't buy a 7!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, from what I read, I ordered a 7 and it is too small (short). Size 8 might have been a better fit. Very unfortunate that this sandal doesn't come in half sizes:(
customer_reviews.author: mabeldoll

customer_reviews.title: Use the size chart and you’ll get a good fit
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and great for wider feet. I used the size chart and measured my foot. 9 inch foot - ordered a size 7. They fit perfectly. Definitely use the size chart and you will get the right size.
customer_reviews.author: Painted Lady

customer_reviews.title: You'll fall in love and want more!
customer_reviews.text: I love these so much, I bought them in both white and black. They're super comfy, well fitted (I have wide feet & these fit perfect!) And I get compliments everytime I wear them. I highly suggest getting a pair or two ;)
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable for people with wide feet!
customer_reviews.text: I normally don't get these types of sandals just because of the fact that my foot is so fat and they never fit or if they do fit they fit very very tight but these sandals are possibly the most comfortable sandals I have ever purchased as well as stylish! Completely in love with them.
customer_reviews.author: Dora Esparza

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Definitely order your normal size! I love these sandals so much!!! They are so comfortable and i have gotten so many compliments on how cute they are! Definitely will be buying more
customer_reviews.author: Loren Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: SQUEAKING and NOT FOR WIDE FEET
customer_reviews.text: I didn't see any reviews mention this, but they squeak with every other step. It almost sounds like a farting noise, the strap with the logo is too tight and the material itself is unforgiving. I should also mention that I have wide feet in general, however, some of these reviews led me to believe it would fit. They are cute and I wish my toes could fit and moreover that they didn't make noises. I ended up giving them to my mom since she didn't mind the noise and has narrow feet.
customer_reviews.author: maria agustin

customer_reviews.title: They are reasonable price, comfortable and light weight
customer_reviews.text: I walk entire time at work and these are so comfortable and light . I get compliments on them every time I wear them
customer_reviews.author: Mae de Melo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and comfy. I love them. I generaly need to size up in sandals but they fit true to size like all my other Adidas. If you have very narrow feet I would consider maybe sizing down as they are very wide.
customer_reviews.author: Kiersten Jones

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable sandals
customer_reviews.text: I'm a size 7.5 bought a size 8 but was too big so just gifted those to my mom and bought a size 7 and fit perfect. These are great for outdoors and dry fast when they get wet.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Betancourt

customer_reviews.title: Super adorable and comfortable!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so happy that I received these sandals. They are so adorable and comfy to wear. The only thing bad about it is that if you sweat from your feet. It’ll feel weird and slippery. But I’m so okay with that. I will say that I had ordered a size 7 but when I saw the shoe box. It was a size 6. I’m just surprised they still fit. They literally fit me perfectly and I’m kinda shocked. I have a feeling if I would of actually gotten the size 7, it would be big. So I am happy with this little accident. 😍
customer_reviews.author: Jesucena M Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these sandals. I live in NYC, which means I don’t have a car and walk everywhere. These sandals are so comfortable and stylish. I have a wide yet small foot so it’s always a pain for me to find good footwear that fits true to size. I walk about 5 miles everyday in them and have yet to see any blistering or chafing. Overall this is a great product!
customer_reviews.author: wendy

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied, comfortable, and cute
customer_reviews.text: I am 35 weeks pregnant and my feet swell up, i needed a comfortable pair of sandals i can wear kn this heat without hurting my feet. These fit perfectly. I went with my true size. They do run on the bigger side... if you have wide feet like me have no fear. They fit my wide feet. I usually wear a 8-8.5. I got an 8
customer_reviews.author: Adrianna

customer_reviews.title: Great dupe for the $60 Nike sandals
customer_reviews.text: I’ll be honest these are not the cutest or most fashionable shoes ever, but they are SO COMFY. I’m pregnant and have very swollen feet, which caused me to outgrow my Nike sandals that are made similarly. These are cheaper while being the same quality, and fit wider than the Nike sandals.
customer_reviews.author: drew jenkinson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, must buy!
customer_reviews.text: I have orthopedic issues and it is extremely hard for me to find sandals that work well, even with that being said these sandals are the BEST I’ve ever found! Super comfortable, lightweight, and cute- hard to find sandals that are all 3 in my experience. Best money I’ve spent in a long time, so happy with this purchase. Highly recommend these for anyone, especially if comfort is your main concern! I’m typically a 5 1/2 to 6 in women’s, I ordered a size 5 and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: amanderz

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Received these today. I normally wear a size 7.5-8 but ordered a 7 because of other reviews. They fit perfectly! Glad I went a size down. The Velcro is so and the shoes are comfy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Mackie

customer_reviews.title: SIZE DOWN
customer_reviews.text: SIZE DOWN! So disappointed I didn’t do that, now the size I need is sold out!!!!!! I’m a 6 in everything even the tanjun shoes but for these, a 5 would have been perfect. Great shoes tho.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: awkwardly large- like big baby shoes
customer_reviews.text: yes they fit a little large in size but that's not what i'm referring to---its like the front of the shoe is out of proportion with the rest of it. reminds me of a toddler's walking shoe. Not very cute in person (in my opinion)
customer_reviews.author: Laika

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable sandal ever
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these and I get compliments on them. Great price. Light weight. And I was worried cause I have wide feet. Strap fit great and super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!!!
customer_reviews.text: These things are so comfortable plus the strap around your ankle is excellent for support they fit perfectly to size... worth the money considering they're way cheaper than the Nikes I would recommend 100%
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: if u have thivk or chubby ankles....
customer_reviews.text: these are super cute if u have wide feet like me . there comfy and match everything!!!!! Don't BUY if u have THICK CHUBBY ANKLES. the strap wont close.
customer_reviews.author: Trying more online purchases :-)

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: These are a great summer sandal! My daughter wore these in the ocean, Also hiking, on the beach. These were a good Perfect fit for her summer go to Sandal
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Recieved 2 right shoes
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these sandals for my BDay cruise and realized that I was sent 2 right shoes while on my trip this was by far the most hilarious disappointment ever !! I had several outfits to match the shoes and was unable to wear them due to being shipped TWO RIGHT SHOES!! SMH !1 Epic !! FAIL!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Just get your size. I am glad that I didn't size down because everyone in the comment kept saying "size up" they are very light weight and comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Ann

customer_reviews.title: A great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new sandals! There is support in all the right places. I wore them to the salon. My feet felt great all day!
customer_reviews.author: G. johnson

customer_reviews.title: They did rub a little on the in and outside of the front of the  foot.
customer_reviews.text: The look is even better in person and looks great on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon R. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very cute sandals to chill in. They are comfortable but if you have feet that easily sweat when it’s hit you may notice this. Otherwise they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Vonda

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love and adore these..wish they came in red..I wasn't sure about the velcro strap at first but it works well with my one foot that swells a little during the day...I get a lit of compliments on them
customer_reviews.author: chubby and kute

customer_reviews.title: AS DESCRIBED
customer_reviews.text: These pair of Adidas Sandals are so comfortable♥︎.. I'm a size 7 1/2 US I got these in a size 7.5 or 8 .. Sandals fit bigger for some people These are worth it and they're so adorable
customer_reviews.author: xcWcx

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy
customer_reviews.text: super comfy! I love running errands in them. They run a little big, but that's a good thing. Your foot has enough room to flex as you walk.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda T

customer_reviews.title: Get your regular size,good for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: I like the velcro strap,feels more secure,and the front band is comfy across my wide foot,got used to them right away,and they are cute.
customer_reviews.author: Kaethe b.

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a 7. I got a 7 but probably would have gotten an 8. They fit exact but super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, wish they were the same material as my adidas slides those are so comfy but these are still pretty comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie phillips

customer_reviews.title: Order your regular size
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews that said these ran large. I wear a 5.5 so I ordered a 5 instead of a 6. They fit, but I wish I had ordered the 6
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and never made my feet sweaty or slide even though it was 100 degree weather and I was walking around a zoo.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Buy a size up
customer_reviews.text: I recommend buying a size up, I wear a size 10 but the 11 in woman made it a perfect fit . Imma be honest when I pulled them out the box I wanted to take them back Bc at first they looked a bit cheesy until I put them sucker on. So many compliments. Soooo cute on and wasn’t expecting them to be soooo freaking comfortable! I wish my enclosed gym shoes felt as good as these Babies. They’re pretty much my everyday sandals
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! These are so comfortable! The seem to have arch support and they are velcro! I have a wide foot and I didn't have any problems fitting in to them. You dont have to break them in either, they are good to go! I LOVE THESE SANDALS!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Order a size up
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loved them until she tried them on. I ordered a half size up thinking they would fit according to the reviews. You will definitely need to go up a full size, if you want extra room try a full size and a half. Had to returm them and get a credit to my account due to the needed size being unavailable. Will definitely order these again in multiple colors if her size becomes available.
customer_reviews.author: M3M

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: I have wide feet and am between size so I sized down and went to an 8. Perfect fit and super comfortable. Definitely worth the $29 I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Ortiz Family

customer_reviews.title: I'm In Love
customer_reviews.text: TO REVIEWS I THOUGHT IT WOULD'VE BEEN BIG BUT MY NINE FITS PERFECTLY, THEY'RE CUTE AND COMFY THEY CAN BE DRESSED UP OR DOWN. NOW I THINK I'M GOING TO GET ANOTHER ONE OR TWO. IM IN LOVEWITH EM' AND THEY ARE NEW LOL.
customer_reviews.author: Kim K

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and soooo comfortable! My new favorite sandal. They are so light, I will be buying these in other colors as well!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Lamassa

customer_reviews.title: BEST SANDAL EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: I plan to buy these in every color Adidas has of them. BEST SANDAL EVER. Lightweight, fashionable and comfortable. Way to go, Adidas! Wooh!
customer_reviews.author: Ashton Faulkner

customer_reviews.title: Super lightweight and comfy!!
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a 8.5/9 and ordered at 8 per reviews (plus it was a lot cheaper than the 9) and it's a great fit! I would highly recommend these, they are crazy comfortable!!!
customer_reviews.author: adiana u.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: They are so cute! they are wide so I got a 6 when i'm normally a 6.5 and they fit great! My feet are wide too
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: I love them! They had a lot of great reviews, but I was skeptical because I have wide feet. Love them so much I’m looking at other colors on different sites, since I know my size know. Highly recommend!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Martinez

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THESE
customer_reviews.text: I love these so much. they fit great and look great. I want to order another pair!!
customer_reviews.author: Charity

customer_reviews.title: I love these sandals!
customer_reviews.text: They are super comfortable and very sporty looking. I love the strap, gives me ankle support and I know they wont slip off while driving or walking. I've even worked out in them. I love these sandals!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Love Them!
customer_reviews.text: They are comfy, stylish, and worth every penny! A must buy ladies! Can’t wait to wear with my other adidas accessories 🤗
customer_reviews.author: Gemini

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: It's very light weight and comfortable. I wish I can wear it year round. Get your exact size.
customer_reviews.author: Ise

customer_reviews.title: Súper confortable and light weight
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Happy with my purchase. Super light weight and hugs my foot beautifully! I get so many complements!
customer_reviews.author: Lesly

customer_reviews.title: Want another pair different color
customer_reviews.text: I like how light they r on my feet but the the soul could be better a little more thicker
customer_reviews.author: Ebony Perry

customer_reviews.title: Super Attractive Slide but
customer_reviews.text: If you get anything on the white area of this slide you can hang it up...there is no cleaning it
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic 🔑

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and style.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my girlfriend because she has a salon business and stands on her feet all day. She says it's extremely comfortable for her, even more than the previous Crocs she owned. Highly recommended for people in the cosmetology field or any job that has you on your feet for long periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: Lowell Gillett

customer_reviews.title: They're comfortable and cute.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sandal. I read the review about to go down a size. Thank you. Thank you cuz I wear 8 and I order size 7 fit perfectly...
customer_reviews.author: maria carolina alcala redman

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: ABSOLUTELY LOVE these, receiving compliments. So comfortable and the best price I could find!
customer_reviews.author: Miki

customer_reviews.title: Buy this shoe
customer_reviews.text: You will not regret buying this shoe. It is so comfortable and you will not be disappointed. I am going to college in the fall and this shoe will be a lifesaver whenever my feet start to hurt after the gym or even when I go out with my friends. You will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: A tad too small
customer_reviews.text: Ordered my size but they were still a tad too small. Had to send back.
customer_reviews.author: ADM

product_meta.title: adidas Women's Adilette Sandals Slide
product_meta.description: A transitional style for your everyday activities. In the locker room or on the street, these women's sandals feature adjustable straps and an ultra-soft footbed for total comfort. The modern, sport-inspired design gives a clean look.
feature_bullets: Shaft measures approximately 6-12 inches from arch
Platform measures approximately 0.5 inches inches inches
Boot opening measures approximately 0-3 inches around
